tv.generator-info-name: Processed by Open-EPG Visual Processor v1.0

programme.title: Rage New Music
programme.desc: Discover the wildest new music videos on rage. Essential grooves and boundary-pushing visuals from Australia and beyond.

programme.title: Rage Charts
programme.desc: Count down the hottest chart hits, and catch up on some of the most promising new popular music videos on rage.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going every Saturday morning with wall-to-wall music videos, from classic hits and long-forgotten tracks from the rage vault, to the latest new releases and special features.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.title: Professor T
programme.desc: After discovering the body of an undercover police officer, in the boot of a car, the CID team blunder into a Drugs Squad operation against a major trafficker that appears to implicate one of their closest colleagues. (Final)

programme.title: I Was Actually There
programme.desc: It was a move that shocked the nation. Fifty years ago, Prime Minister Gough Whitlam was dismissed by the Governor-General, Sir John Kerr. The government was dissolved and an election called.

programme.title: Return To Paradise
programme.desc: A tense game of lawn bowls turns to chaos when a player is killed on the green in broad daylight by an antique ornamental bushrangers gun. Is the ghost of Bushranger Bill haunting Dolphin Cove?

programme.title: rage Guest Programmer: Noasis
programme.desc: Theyre the number one Oasis experience on stage... now on rage. Join Darren and Tom from Oasis tribute act Noasis as they line up their favourite music videos.

programme.title: Rage
programme.desc: Keep the party vibe going with wall-to-wall music videos, from new releases to classics and the long-forgotten.

programme.title: Insiders
programme.desc: David Speers discusses the week in politics with Clare Armstrong, Paul Sakkal and Katina Curtis including environment protection reform, power prices, Tomago, net zero, a jump in inflation, APEC, Sussan Ley and the Coalition.

programme.title: The World This Week
programme.desc: Johnson Raela presents a roundup of the weeks big stories. Prince Andrew stripped of his royal titles, Hurricane Melissa batters the Caribbean, and more arrests in the Louvre robbery investigation.

programme.title: Songs Of Praise: The Sacred Sound Of The Organ
programme.desc: Katherine Jenkins visits Pembroke College Chapel in Cambridge to explore the sacred sound of the church organ and to meet organist virtuoso and star of the Proms Anna Lapwood.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.sub-title: Spring: Backyard Habitat and Pruning Natives
programme.desc: Jane discovers a lush urban courtyard, Josh joins a research team tracking backyard biodiversity, Hannah explores a flourishing cottage garden, Millie tackles native maintenance, and we meet award-winning poultry breeders.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Two family mysteries; a man left in a pram as a baby, is searching for his birth mother to discover the truth about his beginnings, and a daughter looking for the Italian birth father she has never met.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia
programme.desc: At Rye on the Mornington Peninsula, Ryan plans to build a unique home, with boulders in the living room, and his bedroom in a cave.

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Lego Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga And Blindfolded Tetris
programme.desc: We journey to a galaxy far, far away to play through the biggest brickified adventure yet, covering all nine main Star Wars films in LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga, plus Challenge Accepted returns.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Dr Xand goes head to head with Dougie the dog in todays lab to show how your shoulders work, catch up with our Ouch Babies in their first weeks of life and meet triple jumper Naomi Ogbeta in Brilliant Bodies.

programme.title: Star Wars: Young Jedi Adventures
programme.desc: The Jedi must stop pirates from ruining Life Day.

programme.title: Hard Quiz Kids
programme.sub-title: Fungi, Ned Kelly, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory and Lin-Manuel Miranda
programme.desc: It takes all sorts, and Hard Quiz Kids is a big bag of liquorice! Vying for Tom Gleesons Big Brass Mug are experts on fungi, Ned Kelly, Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, and Lin-Manuel Miranda.

programme.title: Abbott Elementary
programme.desc: When the students start participating in a new online trend that causes disruption to the school, the teachers band together to put an end to it.

programme.title: Pokemon: Diamond And Pearl
programme.desc: As our heroes help treasure-hunter Cheryl with her quest for the Enchanted Honey, they meet a Trainer named Gardenia who adores Grass-type Pokemon.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!: Do Try This At Home
programme.desc: A camera pill shows Dr Chris digestive system at work squidging food, and get ready to make your own fake stomach!

programme.title: Good Game Spawn Point
programme.sub-title: Shredders And Challenge Accepted: Unpacking Irl
programme.desc: We shred some slopes with the snowboarding action of Shredders, and take on the challenge of Unpacking in real life in Challenge Accepted!

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.sub-title: Knobbly Knees And What They Are For
programme.desc: Can you wobble your kneecaps?! Find out why and what you need them for in todays lab. Meet three amazing Big Heart Ouch Award nominees and find out who is Top Doc in Ouchology.

programme.title: Horrible Histories Special: Staggering Storytellers
programme.desc: Spanning 3,000 years of recorded history we look at how some of our finest writers cured their writing block. We see the development of storytelling technology and learn how Charles Dickens was the Harry Styles of his day.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: The Farmer has set up a stall by the side of the road, selling produce from the garden. He leaves Bitzer in charge for the day. But lazy Bitzer soon gets bored and gives Shaun the job while he puts his feet up by the pool.

programme.title: Crongton
programme.desc: McKay plans a family meal. The gang hunts for the key ingredient in North Crongton.

programme.title: Abbott Elementary
programme.desc: The teachers are appalled after seeing a commercial criticizing Abbott Elementary.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Zoo
programme.desc: This week at the Columbus Zoo: daredevil flying goats, adorable cheetah cubs, a cranky female tiger, a lethal king cobra and a rhino that paints!

programme.title: Penn And Teller: Fool Us
programme.desc: Featured magicians include Jaana Felicitas and Nikolai Striebel, Evan Northrup, Marc Weide and Vincent.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The doctors try to trick their body temperatures, the Ouch-Mobile is open for more intriguing medical mysteries, and Dr Xand tries to stop his body giving him away when he tells fibs in a lie detector test.

programme.title: 100% Wolf: Legend Of The Moonstone
programme.desc: Freddy attempts to teach Batty how to be human while searching for a cure for her new human form. A class assignment to capture the mysterious Golden Horn and prove who the alpha wolf is goes awry when a wilderwolf attacks!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who?
programme.sub-title: The Phantom, The Talking Dog And The Hot Hot Hot Sauce!
programme.desc: The gang heads to Nashville, Tennessee to meet up with country music legend Kacey Musgraves!

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: Susan becomes a devotee of an American lifestyle guru, while Ben joins a bizarre secret society called the Brotherhood of the Cockerel. Meanwhile, Michael pilfers to impress a girl, and Abi taxes Rogers limited Welsh.

programme.title: Jonestown: Terror In The Jungle
programme.desc: The press exposes the dark side of Jim Jones, causing a mass exodus to Jonestown. His followers soon realise its not the utopia their leader promised.

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: The doctors make an unusual type of cheese with Dr Xands body bacteria, find out what to do if someone breaks their leg in First Aid, and Dr Chris meets a man with a bionic eye.

programme.title: 100% Wolf: Legend Of The Moonstone
programme.desc: Freddy becomes convinced that theres a wilderwolf at Howlington and launches a daring investigation to prove that its the school accountant, Mr Sminch. Howlington gets a new teacher, the super cool and charming Ric Rawls.

programme.title: The Strange Chores
programme.desc: Creating some Clones to help with his long list of commitments, Pierce must confront his weakness for people-pleasing, and learn how to set some boundaries.

programme.title: Mythbusters
programme.desc: Could you build a jet-pack from plans on the internet? And, the build team suffers for science in the myth of pyramid power.

programme.title: Louis Therouxs Forbidden America
programme.desc: Louis Theroux heads to Los Angeles as the world of adult entertainment grapples with its own wave of #MeToo. (Final)

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: The moon is full and so is the ER. Hathaways patient believes that he is a werewolf. Dr. Greene is still haunted by the death of Jodi OBrien and isnt sure he can function as a doctor. Benton tends to his sick mother.

programme.title: Moon And Me
programme.desc: Inside the Little Toy House, everybody is surprised to discover the Roundabout has been left in the sitting room. In Storyland, Little Nana and Lambkin go flying in the aeroplane.

programme.title: Beep And Mort
programme.desc: Everyone has an idea for building sandy sculptures at the beach. Except for Mort, who cant think of anything! When he discovers magical fossil shapes in the cave, he uses his imagination to create the perfect idea.

programme.title: Hoopla Doopla!
programme.desc: Squidgie is always giving presents to her friends. So they decide they should do something to show how grateful they are by organising a special present for Squidgie.

programme.title: The Sound Collector
programme.desc: The seaside is a great place to find sounds, playing a seashell can even call a Mole!

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Flop play hide and seek on the way to Padgets shop. Bing doesnt want the game to end when they get there so he hides behind the door to the stock room, where Flop really cant see him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic. Although the attic is very full, deciding what to keep and what to throw out is quite hard since Granny and Grandpa want to keep everything.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: The Farmer becomes annoyed when a crow begins to create mayhem across the farm. Bitzer disguises himself as a scarecrow, but needs help from Shaun to make the problem disappear.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Supertatos dancing is too powerful and destructive, but when he has to face Evil Pea in a dance-off to save his trapped friends, he soon realises his moves can save the day.

programme.title: Isadora Moon
programme.desc: Isadora and Zoe are partners in a school cake baking competition. Zoe, desperate to win talks Isadora into using magic to make a magnificent, magical winning cake.

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.desc: Dracs flying mishap and Katyas broomstick fear teach the Super Monsters valuable lessons on teamwork, resilience, and facing challenges together.

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: The Mechas have to help when a slide sends people all the way across the farm, where they spend more time walking than sliding.

programme.title: Isadora Moon: Isadora Moons Winter Magic
programme.desc: Isadoras Aunt Crystal, a winter fairy, brings Isadoras snow friend, Gordie to life. When he starts melting, they go on an adventure to the land of Snow and Ice where they meet the Snow Queen.

programme.title: Andy And The Band
programme.desc: Odd Sock Georgia cant get her PE kit from a strange lost property cupboard at school, so Andy and the Band take on a daring and delicate operation to retrieve it.

programme.title: Play School Science Time
programme.desc: Why do some bubbles pop and not others? Professor Bubbles is an expert in bubbles! Using his special formula, Leah and Professor Bubbles make their own brilliant bubbles to test what makes bubbles pop!

programme.title: Big Lizard
programme.desc: Whilst exploring deep space, a meteor strikes Cosima and Dads ship! Crash-landing on the unexplored planet of Proxima, Cosima makes a new best friend - Big Lizard!

programme.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
programme.desc: When Drews dance partner is unable to perform at the school talent show, the Dream Factory Crew equips Jonathan with programmed dancing shoes to act as a replacement. But the shoes go haywire!

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts And The Slime Eels
programme.desc: Kwazii covets the treasure in a sunken pirate ship - but its protected by slime-squirting Slime Eels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The squirrels discover the wonderful world of accessorising!

programme.title: Thomas And Friends: Big World! Big Adventures!
programme.desc: Raul wants a chance to beat Thomas in a game, but his super-competitive nature soon gets him into trouble.

programme.title: Millie Magnificent
programme.desc: When Maya shows Millie and Ben her new ship-in-a-bottle, Captain Millie gets it in her head to build a real sailboat in her backyard.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Costa and the kids visit a school who have reclaimed a block of land and regenerating it with local, native plants and trees. They need some help weeding and planting.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Blueys backyard zoo is home to wonderful animals, especially the big blue Daddy Gorilla. But when he grabs visitor Bingo and escapes, Zookeeper Bluey must recapture the wild beast.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet the worlds largest and heaviest lizard, the Komodo dragon, and lay a trail for him to find food. Then they meet a chameleon who has a very long tongue.

programme.title: In The Night Garden
programme.desc: Makka Pakka is washing the ball when his Uff-uff blows right away. It falls into Upsy Daisys bed.

programme.title: Hoopla Doopla!
programme.desc: Ziggy wishes he was just like his favourite super-hero. So he makes himself a costume and goes to find someone to rescue in town.

programme.title: Daniel Tigers Neighbourhood
programme.desc: During a beach party at school, Prince Wednesday spills paint on his pants and the floor! Hes really upset, but telling Teacher Harriet what happened makes him feel so much better.

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Bing and Flop are building a sandcastle when Pando joins them in the sandpit with his wind-up digger toy to help. Bing finds a lovely thing in the sand and thinks it will make the perfect decoration for the top of his castle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and Suzy are best friends. But one day they quarrel so theyre not best friends anymore. They really miss each other but refuse to make up. When they finally do, they realise that they will always be best friends.

programme.title: Shaun The Sheep
programme.desc: Calm in the barn is disturbed when a pair of ducks set up a nest on the roof of Bitzers kennel. The ducks dont take kindly to efforts to encourage them to move on.

programme.title: Supertato
programme.desc: Banana Superstars show is stopped when Evil Pea steals his peel. Supertato races against him to get it back, but trouble hits when a giant banana statue collapses onto the stage.

programme.title: Isadora Moon
programme.desc: When Ava, an unfriendly girl, arrives in Isadoras class, she hurts Isadoras feelings by suggesting shes not a real half fairy!

programme.title: Super Monsters
programme.sub-title: Glorb the Gobbler / Hullabaloo at the Petting Zoo
programme.desc: The Super Monsters meet magical animals at the petting zoo, help Griffy the griffin learn to fly, and work together to fix Glorbs giant mishap after overfeeding him, learning teamwork in a fun-filled adventure.

programme.title: Super Monsters: Once Upon A Rhyme
programme.desc: The Super Monsters share magical fairy tales and nursery rhymes, bringing stories to life with humor, songs, and lessons of friendship, inspiring younger Monster kiddos to embrace imagination and teamwork.

programme.title: Maddie + Triggs
programme.desc: Maddie + Triggs are magically transported to a world of echoes inside the belly of a whale, where they try to help their new friend Harriot rediscover her singing voice.

programme.title: Andy And The Band
programme.desc: Odd Sock Mary has a valuable vase shed like protecting. Mary needs to sell the vase to raise funds to keep her art gallery open. Cousin Mac invents a super security alarm, but theres a notorious art thief on the prowl!

programme.title: Play School Science Time
programme.desc: Why do things change shape when we look at them through water? Teo investigates light refraction and experiments with patterns and drawings to see how they change when seen through water!

programme.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
programme.desc: Its an epic game of "Find the Flag" - and the winner gets to open the mystery box of presents that Drew and Jonathans mom brought back from her business trip.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.sub-title: The Octonauts And The Sardine School
programme.desc: The Octonauts must work together as a team to help a lost sardine find her school.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: The squirrels learn about how to achieve their ambitions.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends: Big World! Big Adventures!
programme.desc: When Diesel hides from the other engines, his plans backfire and its him that gets a surprise.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Junior
programme.desc: Hannah works with two brothers to create a garden that delights all of the senses. Alfie is vision impaired and loves being active and playing, so they create a garden of games he can enjoy with his brother, William.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Mum and Dad are going on an adventure wearing the kids as their cheeky backpacks! Seeing the sights and buying street food, backpacking is a blast - until they lose their passports.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet two giraffes, the tallest animals in the world, to feed them leaves. Then they meet some red pandas to see their wild connection with giraffes.

programme.desc: Discover the wildest new music videos on rage. Essential grooves and boundary-pushing visuals from Australia and beyond.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Follow the latest on todays news, covering whats happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe to bring you the news you need to know. Presented by Craig Smart in Perth.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch with ABC News. Weve got more reporters in more places, connecting communities and covering the stories and issues that matter to you. Presented by Craig Smart.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: DW News
programme.desc: The latest international news and the days top stories from a European perspective. Our broadcast partner DW brings you live coverage from Berlin with updated reports and expert analysis on the big global issues and events.

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time to stay in touch with whats happening in our world. Manny Tsigas presents the latest international news from ABC News correspondents as well as interviews with experts and guests.

programme.title: Planet America: Weekend Edition
programme.desc: Chas and John cover next weeks 2025 state elections in Virginia, New Jersey and New York, the NYC Mayoral race, Californias Proposition 50, will Trump run for a third term in 2028, and why are US politicians so old?

programme.title: Asia News Week
programme.desc: Yvonne Yong brings you a weekly roundup of the stories making news across the Asia region, plus whats trending on social media and making an impact on the culture and the way people live.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show
programme.desc: In a special edition of That Pacific Sports Show, Tiana Penitani Gray and Sam Wykes look back on some of their favourite stories and guests from 2025.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast
programme.desc: Fauziah Ibrahim and Johanna Nicholson bring you this mornings news, politics, culture, weather and global affairs including the latest from the APEC Leaders Summit in Gyeongju, South Korea. Plus sport with Daniela Intili.

programme.title: The World This Week
programme.desc: Johnson Raela presents a roundup of the weeks big stories. Prince Andrew stripped of his royal titles, Hurricane Melissa batters the Caribbean, and more arrests in the Louvre robbery investigation.

programme.title: ABC News Regional
programme.desc: Two people killed in an underground mine explosion, a close encounter with a meteor for a rural driver, plus the lengths a male dolphin will go to attract a mate. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: The Breakfast Couch
programme.desc: Bridget, James, Emma and the team chat with 5 Seconds of Summer, bestselling author Matthew Reilly, natural history illustrator Sami Bayly, Peking Duk musician turned DJ Reuben Styles AKA DJ YOGA, and film critic Zak Hepburn.

programme.title: Not Stupid
programme.desc: As Donald Trump and Chinas Xi Jinping meet for the first time since 2019, Jeremy Fernandez and guest host Emma Shortis discuss the meeting and what it means for the future of the relationship between the two superpowers.

programme.desc: Melissa Mackay presents the latest from ABC News on the weekend bringing you todays top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, analysis and updated news, sport, weather and information.

programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight
programme.desc: Mariam Saab brings you the latest headlines and a brief summary of the days top stories from ABC News.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and todays stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the days top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of whats happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: Asia News Week
programme.desc: Join Yvonne Yong for the news from Asia: Trump and Xi meet after months of trade tensions between the US and China, ASEAN welcomes Timor-Leste, plus at Halloween we examine why horror fans love Indonesias golden era of gore.

programme.title: Way Out AG
programme.desc: Jujubes have been grown in Asia for thousands of years but are relatively new to Australia. Some inventive farmers in South Australias Riverland are now even turning it into vinegar and beer, as Landline reported in 2020.

programme.title: BTN High
programme.desc: The eSafety commissioner, Julie Inman Grant, answers your questions about the upcoming social media ban.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Theres never been a more important time for transparency and trust. ABC News brings you the days top stories and latest news with more reporters to tell you whats going on and why it matters. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight
programme.desc: Meredith Sheehan brings you the latest headlines and a brief summary of the days top stories from ABC News.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and todays stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: ABC Late News Weekend
programme.desc: When you need to know whats happening turn to ABC News for coverage you can trust. We bring you todays events from reporters across Australia, connecting communities and telling your stories. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: ABC Late News
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the days top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of whats happening as it unfolds.
